channel.title: Scraps on Colin Spear
channel.description: Recent content in Scraps on Colin Spear

item.description: Roundtable A couple ad hoc requests fac staff documentation IAA documentation GES administration and automation Faculty enrolment survey NSSE data prep enrolments by day and time NSSE two options, how to request UVic data if desired

Trying to keep up the habit. Hannah and Roan are upstairs, I am down on the ball with Else on my chest. I got my first dose of the vaccine today. It was surreal and moving. It was administered in the lobby of the UBC Pharmaceutical building, a big, airy space with stairwells and architectural elements protruding from the walls out into space. Temporary dividers were set up so that the line snaked between check in stations where I was given hand sanitizer numerous times along with a mask and a vaccination card.

Friday, three beers in Don’t worry, they’re not strong beers. Tonight I am tired. I have a tired baby on my chest, fisting about being constrained by her carrier. I have a moderate amount of alcohol in my bloodstream which has certainly already begun to metabolize (give me more! says the goblin). I configured a remote server for my new website today and spent two hours on a phone call learning the convoluted, manually adjusted ETL process for one of our reporting tables at work.
Vaccine registration confirmation R - E Y S 9 H 3 8 J Booking confirmation R-EYS9H38J
